scripts.deploy-buyer: source .env && forge script script/DeployBuyer.s.sol:DeployBuyer --rpc-url $BSC_RPC_URL --broadcast -vvvvv && node update-contract-address.js buyer
scripts.deploy-seller: source .env && forge script script/DeploySeller.s.sol:DeploySeller --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --broadcast -vvvvv && node update-contract-address.js seller
scripts.reset-buyer: yarn drain-buyer && yarn deploy-buyer && yarn load-buyer
scripts.reset-seller: yarn drain-seller && yarn deploy-seller && yarn load-seller
